verses.roman:
bhūyāt patir ayaṁ mahyaṁ
dhātā tad anumodatām
iti sarvāḥ pṛthak kṛṣṇe
bhāvena hṛdayaṁ dadhuḥ

synonyms: bhūyāt—may become; patiḥ—husband; ayam—He; mahyam—my; dhātā—providence; tat—that; anumodatām—may please grant; iti—thus; sarvāḥ—all of them; pṛthak—individually; kṛṣṇe—in Kṛṣṇa; bhāvena—with the idea; hṛdayam—their hearts; dadhuḥ—placed.
translation: With the thought "May providence grant that this man become my husband," each and every princess absorbed her heart in contemplation of Kṛṣṇa.
